title: Yeh Raha Dil
overview: The story revolves around Hayat, Zaki, and Nida. Zaki is in madly love with Nida a super model, but his parents are not happy with it. So, he leaves his home in anger and visit a foreign country. In that trip, Zaki meets Hayat, both have totally different lifestyles and goals in life. However, when they meet each other, they find each other's company very comfortable. This starts something complex yet beautiful, but devastating for all three of them. What will happen next is the story of this beautiful drama.
